HOW_TO_CONTENT.heading: How to Resize multiple images online for free.
steps: Upload the images file or Click on the drop-down arrow and select Dropbox/Google Drive
Adjust the size and style using the options provided.

FAQ.question: Is it safe to allow access to my drive?
FAQ.answer: Yes, it is absolutely safe to allow and give us access to your drive. We won't be making any changes to your site, and your files will be safe with you.

FAQ.question: How can I upload files from my drive/dropbox?
FAQ.answer: Click on the drop-down arrow and simply select the option of Google Drive or Dropbox. Select the Google account from where you want to link your drive. Now you can select the files that you want to upload.

FAQ.question: What are the features offered by the “Resize multiple images online” feature from safeimagekit.com while resizing multiple images?
FAQ.answer: The Image resizing feature from safeimagekit.com offers versatile features while resizing the image file. The main features include Modifying the uploaded images by adjusting the dimensions of the images, such as height, width, etc. This Resize multiple images online feature also presents the resizing by entering size, which can be extended to max or min depending on the images uploaded. This feature also provides a strict mode and orientation mode for accurate rotation adjustment. The multiple image resizer also provides the option to adjust the quality of the images and also lets the user convert the format of the images to the user’s advantage.

FAQ.question: What are the parameters provided by the multiple images resizer feature from safeimagekit.com after we upload images?
FAQ.answer: The Resize multiple images online feature from safeimagekit.com provides various parameters after we upload images; these parameters include the name of the images, size of the images, type of images, etc. The parameter is the last modified, where it gives us the time, date, and time zone where it was last modified. FAQ.question: What are the Resize multiple images online features provided by safeimagekit.com while resizing the images?
FAQ.answer: The Resize multiple images online feature from safeimagekit.com provides many features while resizing multiple images. It lets the user adjust the dimensions of the images by adjusting the measurements such as width and height. FAQ.question: How does the quality adjustment option of the resizing feature from safeimagekit.com work?
FAQ.answer: The quality adjustment option of Resize multiple images online feature from safeimagekit.com is an important feature that lets the user decide the overall quality of the multiple images. This feature can be easily accessed from the “Enter the quality” space after uploading the images. This adjusts the sharpness, contrast, blur (in small amounts), and many other image parameters on the whole. The user can decide on the measurement from 0.1 to 1 scale. If he doesn’t want any change in the quality of the images uploaded, this option can be skipped.

FAQ.question: How does the “Mime type” option of Resize multiple images online feature from safeimagekit.com work?
FAQ.answer: The “Mime type” option of the Resize multiple images online feature from safeimagekit.com lets the user choose the format of the images after resizing them using the Resize multiple images online tool from safeimagekit.com. As of now, five types of image formats are available for the particular user. The user can change the format of the image based on his/her requirement. These formats include webp, png, jpg, jpeg, and gif formats. If the user wants to keep the format unchanged, the user can opt for the option called “Enter the mime type.” The “Mime type” option can be accessed at the bottom of the page after uploading the images and saving the changes made.
